meanings.definition: A type of book or movie that provides an intense and exciting experience for the audience.
meanings.sent1: The library had a section dedicated to superthrillers, filled with action-packed novels.
meanings.sent2: I love watching superthrillers on weekends; they always keep me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they picked out a superthriller to read before bedtime.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a superthriller, with unexpected twists and turns every day.
meanings.sent5: The movie director aimed to create a superthriller that would leave the viewers breathless.

meanings.definition: To excite or thrill someone greatly.
meanings.sent1: The magician's tricks never failed to superthrill the audience.
meanings.sent2: The roller coaster ride superthrilled the kids, making them scream with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party plan was sure to superthrill Sarah when she walked in.
meanings.sent4: The news of the upcoming concert superthrilled music fans all over the city.
meanings.sent5: The adventure park's new ride promised to superthrill even the bravest visitors.
